A game that's every bit as original as Super Mario Galaxy and Portal, Braid is a short-lived gem.
A thoroughly addictive title that puts the original title to shame. [Oct 2008, p.76]
The way they mixed in the Halo angle really made sense with the ongoing story and not just thrown in for the sake of a cheap promotion.
As close as you'll come to starring in an epic war movie.
Guitar Hero II is one of the greatest games ever created. It's innovative, addicting, polished and just plain awesome.
